name: LUCID (itch) (CalebBennetts)
description:
Here's a little something to scratch your Metroidvania itch while we're all waiting for  the release of  Metroid Dread.

This is a minimalist experience, probably playable in 10 minutes to half an hour in your first play, and less than 5 minutes to speedrun.

You have 3 abilities:

-A psychic deflection, akin to a melee counter, unlocked at the start,

-A sonar state, your "blue" power,

-A slide/dash attack, your "orange" power.

Disclaimer: Metroid Dread is mentioned only as a point of reference for gameplay style. Lucid is my original IP, and I have no affiliation with Nintendo.
